A good time pass if you just wanna have some fun, but complete mental satisfaction if you are really into it. I got the game for free, but you might have to buy the prime. You can also get prime for free by reaching a certain rank.

Fun to play hard to master. I played this game for a long time now and i can say if you come in late you might be having trouble adjusting for a while but i say give it a couple weeks because once you get it down, getting kills and hyping up your team and getting one tap headshots is one of the greatest feelings you will experience. Yes i recommend this game, Especially since it is now free!
